00017 template<class T> class Array;
00018 class String;
00019 class Dictionary;
00020 
00021 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00022 
00023 typedef unsigned char byte;
00024 typedef int16_t sshort;
00025 typedef int32_t sint;
00026 typedef int64_t slong;
00027 typedef uint16_t sushort;
00028 typedef uint32_t suint;
00029 typedef uint64_t sulong;
00030 
00031 // TODO distinction 32/64 bits platforms
00032 #ifdef __i386__
00033 typedef suint idx_t;
00034 typedef sint sidx_t;
00035 
00036 typedef suint ptr_t;
00037 #elif defined(__x86_64__)
00038 typedef sulong idx_t;
00039 typedef slong sidx_t;
00040 
00041 typedef sulong ptr_t;
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 typedef sulong fsize_t;
00045 typedef slong fssize_t;
00046 
00047 namespace std {
00048     using ::sidx_t;
00049     using ::idx_t;
00050     using ::fsize_t;
00051     using ::fssize_t;
00052     using ::ptr_t;
00053 }

00057 namespace Primitive {
00058 enum Primitive {
00059     Integer,
00060     Long,
00061     Float,
00062     Double,
00063     Bool,
00064     Array,
00065     String,
00066     Dictionary,
00067     FAIL
00068 };
00069 }
00070 
00071 template<class T>
00072 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype(const T &) {
00073     return FAIL;
00074 }
00075 
00076 template<>
00077 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<int>(const int &) {
00078     return Primitive::Integer;
00079 }
00080 template<>
00081 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<sint>(const sint &) {
00082     return Primitive::Integer;
00083 }
00084 
00085 template<>
00086 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<suint>(const suint &) {
00087     return Primitive::Integer;
00088 }
00089 
00090 template<>
00091 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<long>(const long &) {
00092     return sizeof(int) == sizeof(long) ? Primitive::Integer : Primitive::Long;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<>
00096 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<long long>(const long long &) {
00097     return Primitive::Long;
00098 }
00099 
00100 template<>
00101 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<slong>(const slong &) {
00102     return Primitive::Long;
00103 }
00104 
00105 template<>
00106 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<sulong>(const slong &) {
00107     return Primitive::Long;
00108 }
00109 
00110 template<>
00111 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<float>(const float &) {
00112     return Primitive::Float;
00113 }
00114 
00115 template<>
00116 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<bool>(const bool &) {
00117     return Primitive::Bool;
00118 }
00119 
00120 template<class T>
00121 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<Array<T> >(const Array<T> &) {
00122     return Primitive::Array;
00123 };
00124 
00125 template<>
00126 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<String>(const String &) {
00127     return Primitive::String;
00128 }
00129 
00130 template<>
00131 inline Primitive::Primitive primtype<Dictionary>(const Dictionary &) {
00132     return Primitive::Dictionary;
00133 };

00135 class SChar : public virtual Object {
00136 public:
00137     SChar() : SChar(0) {}
00138     SChar(const char c);
00139     SChar(const wchar_t wc);
00140     SChar(const suint i);
00141     SChar(const SChar& orig);
00142     virtual ~SChar();
00143     SChar operator=(const char c);
00144     SChar operator=(const wchar_t wc);
00145     SChar operator=(const suint i);
00146     SChar operator=(const SChar& orig);
00147 private:
00148     suint repres;
00149 };
00150 
00151 typedef SChar schar;
00152 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00153 using Sylph::schar;
